name: Ополаскиватель Лесной бальзам Тройной эффект Природная свежесть для рта 400мл
ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Abies Sibirica Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Powder, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Hypericum Perforatum Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Chelidonium Majus Extract, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin, Cetylpyridinium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Aroma, Propanediol, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Limonene, Linalool, CI 19140, CI 42090.
